name: FACADE (itch) (VSGames)
description:
FACADE Follows Jack, a pastor that finds himself in a parallel dimension, haunted by an unknown foe, do you have what it takes to not give up?

FACADE is free and short, please don't donate, just have fun and share it if you liked :)

1.02 Update -

Fixed sound issue
